Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at relexa hotel Stuttgarter Hof, you'll be centrally located in Berlin, minutes from Martin-Gropius Bau and Checkpoint Charlie Museum. This 4-star hotel is close to Brandenburg Gate and Reichstag Building.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 208 guestrooms featuring refrigerators and flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy massages. You can take advantage of recreational amenities such as a sauna, a steam room, and a fitness center. Additional features include complimentary wireless Internet access, a television in the lobby, and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Grab a bite at one of the hotel's 2 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, a computer station, and express check-out. Planning an event in Berlin? This hotel has 7112 square feet (661 square meters) of space consisting of conference space and meeting rooms. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
Grab a bite at one of the hotel's 2 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Martin-Gropius Bau - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Checkpoint Charlie Museum - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Checkpoint Charlie - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Tempodrom - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Jewish Museum Berlin - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Potsdamer Platz - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
German Museum of Technology - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Berlinale Palast - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Spielbank Berlin - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Sony Center - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
German Cathedral - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Galeries Lafayette - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Berlin State Library - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Konzerthaus Berlin - 1 km / 0.7 mi
Gendarmenmarkt - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi

The nearest airports are:
Berlin (TXL-Tegel) - 8 km / 5 mi
Berlin (SXF-Schoenefeld) - 15.5 km / 9.6 mi

The preferred airport for relexa hotel Stuttgarter Hof is Berlin (TXL-Tegel).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
